entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH IN THE EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
LESS HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTH 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
